title: Tragic Lies
description: From bestselling author L A Cotton, comes a forbidden age-gap romance. Angst... drama... friendship... and football. Will you survive senior year?Peyton Myers has always been the life of the party.But behind her smile and sass is a girl lost and alone, searching for her place in the world.Xander Chase has always been on the outside looking in.But behind his cool indifference and hard exterior is a guy afraid to open his heart to anyone.When he saves Peyton from a tragic accident, their lives are entwined forever. But Xander's not the hero of her story... no matter how much she wants him to be.She’s a girl with her whole life ahead of her.He’s a guy who is drifting through life.And although these two lost souls might be able to heal each other, there's one glaring problem.She's still in high school...And completely forbidden.* Tragic Lies is a 100,000-word standalone romance in the Rixon High series. It deals with some sensitive issues that some readers may find distressing, this book is recommended for readers 17+
author: L.A. Cotton
